original: 由軍閥自行籌組的私兵，具有相當的訓練、配備精良弓矢，對槍兵有加成。雖和盜匪相同，以金錢財物為目標，但強大戰力絕不可輕忽。
text: Private soldiers organized by the warlords themselves, with considerable training, well equipped with bows, and bonuses to spearmen. Although it is the same as the bandits and targets money and property, the powerful combat power must not be neglected.
